coachView.name: User Profile
coachView.layout:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?><ns2:layout xmlns:ns2="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/CoachDesignerNG" xmlns:ns3="http://www.ibm.com/bpm/coachview"><ns2:layoutItem xsi:type="ns2:CustomHTML" version="8550" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"><ns2:id>ef17c7a6-cda7-4a1e-807b-184c14012a4d</ns2:id><ns2:layoutItemId>CustomHTML1</ns2:layoutItemId><ns2:configData><ns2:id>17266b09-ca25-42a3-8ba5-bf52ec045ea8</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.contentType</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>TEXT</ns2:value></ns2:configData><ns2:configData><ns2:id>d597fdc9-c768-420a-8c69-fc2fec08f8f2</ns2:id><ns2:optionName>@customHTML.textContent</ns2:optionName><ns2:value>            <!-- menu profile quick info -->
            <div class="profile clearfix">
              <div id = "profileimage" class="profile_pic">
                <img src="" alt="..." class="img-circle profile_img">
              </div>
              <div class="profile_info">
                <span>Welcome,</span>
                <h2></h2>
              </div>
            </div>
            <!-- /menu profile quick info -->
            <br /></ns2:value></ns2:configData></ns2:layoutItem></ns2:layout>
